name: Smartnestplus
0:
”Alexa open Smart nest plus”
”Alexa ask Smart nest plus to tell me my water consumption report”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart nest plus
Developer Terms of Use
des: Would you like to know all details about your water and electricity consumption and avoid unpleasant surprises in your bills? Smartnest plus allows you to keep track of your consumption providing you with useful data about daily, weekly and monthly usage. detect leaks and high consuming devices on time. You can connect any smart meter that supports sending data to an MQTT broker or you can create your own module to connect to your current measuring device, instructions to build it can be found at smartnest.cz
